DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial study black raspberry confection prevent oral cancer healthy volunteer . Black raspberry contain ingredient may prevent slow growth certain cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Black Raspberry Confection Preventing Oral Cancer Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To select optimal black raspberry confection base altered gene expression chemical profile healthy individual expose 3 black raspberry-based amorphous functional confection modulate bioactive release rate two dos ( 4 g 8 g ) . OUTLINE : Participants randomize 1 6 arm 2 week . ARM I : Participants receive black raspberry ( BRB ) confection 1 fast release orally ( PO ) 4-6 hour apart thrice daily ( TID ) 2 week . ARM II : Participants receive BRB confection 2 fast release PO 4-6 hour apart TID 2 week . ARM III : Participants receive BRB confection 1 intermediate release PO 4-6 hour apart TID 2 week . ARM IV : Participants receive BRB confection 2 intermediate release PO 4-6 hour apart TID 2 week . ARM V : Participants receive BRB confection 1 prolonged release PO 4-6 hour apart TID 2 week . ARM VI : Participants receive BRB confection 2 prolonged release PO 4-6 hour apart TID 2 week .
DOC.criteria: Be healthy , freeliving adult Be nonsmoker ( define adult never smoke cigarette past ten year ) Agree consume standardized vitamin/mineral supplement avoid nutrition alternative supplement duration study Agree follow berryrestricted diet document accidental consumption restrict food day study Agree abstain mouthwash Have active metabolic digestive illness include malabsorptive disorder , renal insufficiency , hepatic insufficiency , cachexia , short bowel syndrome Have active recent history condition cause altered immunity chronic inflammatory disease , autoimmune disorder , cancer , anemia , blood dyscrasia Have know allergy food intolerance ingredient study product ( black raspberry ) , berry , wheat , soy Are strict vegan ( consumption animal , fish egg product ) Are plan conceive , currently pregnant lactating Are heavy alcohol consumer ( define average consumption great 2 drinks/day ) Have history oral cancer currently undergo treatment oral cancer In last month active oral lesion malady currently oral disease obvious open sore oral cavity surround oral opening Have strong gag reflex problem swallow prohibit buccal brush oral cavity Have antibiotic regime last one week last 6 month
